Key Match Events: Edson Álvarez scored a goal in the 11th minute of second-half stoppage time to tie the aggregate score 2-2 in the home-and-home, total-goals series
Bobby Decordova-Reid converted a penalty kick for the Reggae Boyz's decisive goal in the 78th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Mexico qualified for next year's Copa América along with Jamaica
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina will defend its Copa América title when the tournament is played in the US from June 20 to July 14
The US, Mexico, Jamaica, and Panama also advanced to the semifinals of the CONCACAF Nations League
Others: Edson Álvarez saved Mexico from elimination with a goal in the 11th minute of second-half stoppage time
César Huerta was twice allowed to retake his penalty kick in the shootout after two saves by Edrick Menjívar
